articles.title: NASA Pays Elon Musk's SpaceX $2.9 Billion To Ferry Astronauts To Moon Surface - NPR
articles.description: The company beat out two others in its bid to develop a lunar lander that will bring Americans back to the moon in the coming years.
articles.content:

articles.title: American, 2 Russians return to Earth from space station | iNFOnews | Thompson-Okanagan's News Source - iNFOnews
articles.description: A Soyuz space capsule carrying NASA’s Kate Rubins and Russians Sergey Ryzhikov and Sergey Kud-Sverchkov landed at 0455 GMT (12:55 a.m. EDT) Saturday in the steppes of Kazakhstan.
articles.content:
MOSCOW - An American astronaut and two Russians have returned to Earth after six months aboard the International Space Station.

articles.title: Citi's exit from consumer banking is 'no surprise' - The Star Online
articles.description: NEWS that American banking group Citigroup Inc is closing down its consumer banking business in 13 markets, including Malaysia, does not come as a surprise and has ignited fresh concerns that competition in the banking space can only get more heated.
